## encodeRGBM() function

Encodes a color value into RGBM format

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function encodeRGBM(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, rgb: PBShaderExp, maxRange: PBShaderExp | number): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  rgb | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | The color value to be encoded |
|  maxRange | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) \| number | The max range of color components |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The encoded RGBA value
